title.value: Dynamics of winter grain crops weed infestation and peculiarities of a chemical weeding in spring
Динамика засоренности посевов озимых зерновых культур и особенности химической прополки весной

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Stashkevich, N.S., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Plant Protection
Karataj, T.A., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)
Kren, A.V., The peasant farm of Todryk B. S., Grodno region (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the article winter grain crops (wheat (Triticum aestivum); triticale (Triticosecale); rye (Secale cereale)) weed infestation in the Republic of Belarus before yield harvest is shown. Chemical winter crops protection system against weed plants in spring is given. Dynamics of infestation of winter grain crops before harvest in Belarus was presented. There was presented and anlysed a chemical system of measures (herbicides, tank mixtures, their doses and rates of application) to protect winter crops from weeds in the spring. Research results showed that chemical weeding in spring period was economically profitable because it provides a sufficiently high yield increase compared to the control without weeding - from 7.8 to 10.7% for winter rye; 10,4-12,5% - for winter wheat; and from 10.7 to 16 % for winter triticale. Cost recovery in this case was 1.1-25 times and increases with the level of productivity.
